comment._content: Anybody out there know the manufacturer of this TV?
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 55595779@N00
comment._content: The shape/design looks like it could be an RCA

comment.author: 48094458@N00
comment._content: I can't tell you what brand it is, but I can tell you about the photography.  With a large round reflective surface it is difficult to not fill the screen with the photographer and the rest of the shop.  That's why the set is on a desk in a corner, tilted, and the photographer looking up at the thing.  Still doesn't work- I can't imagine this was used for an ad.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/newmundane] Nice observations. In case you're interested, this was taken by a photographer working for the Tallahassee Democrat, but wasn't published in that newspaper.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 8934300@N02
comment._content: Perhaps if you added this to the vintage electronics pool someone there could identify it.
